node.title: usergroup
node._create_table_statement: CREATE TABLE `usergroup` ( `usergroup_id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `shortdesc` char(255) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL, `doctext` text COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci, `jointype` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `modtype` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `messageArchive` tinyint(4) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `recommendationLink` char(32) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL, `moderators` text COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci, PRIMARY KEY (`usergroup_id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_unicode_ci
